attributes.contentHtml: As far as I am know, he made me setup his pterodactyl which I don't really mind but he keep asking every single day plus ping and spam talk, as I setup his stuff I also know the truth, and as so, I would like to say that all privacy and terms of service is copied from many other hosting tos, if you want proof then ask I will show you the ss that he actually said, I still have a ss so he can't delete the message either this isn't all, he used black spigot addons and themes which is not legal and the original owner of the addons who doesn't even know their stuff is being sold for free, ok then if you ignore fine then how about this I only said 40% of proof and I have more if it's needed for feature, hope y'all do ok by reading this big description I made so low writing. Hmm.
Electraa I paid for pterodactyl setup.
